ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] new topic ;)
ygData.msgSnippet: heh almost out of the hole, SS BP and SS Legs hurt the points badly.  a singing short sword will put me way back in the hole, but i m not that close yet.
ygData.messageBody:
heh almost out of the hole, SS BP and SS Legs hurt the points badly. a
singing short sword will put me way back in the hole, but i'm not that close
yet. there was a guild on MM that left to Drinal that basically copied our
point system verbatim, with some minor tweaks. i'm not sure if any guilds
on other servers have quite as structured a point system.

Shada

> I had a look at your guild's site and read up on your loot
> systems (you were
> in the negative loot points, iirc ;) That sounds like a very
> good system,
> and I was wondering if other guilds on other servers did similarly.
